fields.name: Suggestions
fields.description: Use this forum to suggest changes/additions to the sites mechanisims.
fields._description_rendered: Use this forum to suggest changes/additions to the sites mechanisims.

fields.name: Criticisms and Testimonials
fields.description: This forum is for users to share their frusturations and successes. Please limit the content to reflect the user interface/mechnaisims of the site. This is not a forum for users to complain about content.
fields._description_rendered: This forum is for users to share their frusturations and successes. Please limit the content to reflect the user interface/mechnaisims of the site. This is not a forum for users to complain about content.

fields.name: Bugs
fields.description: Use this forum to report bugs. Please explain how the bug occured and possibly cut and paste the url.
fields._description_rendered: Use this forum to report bugs. Please explain how the bug occured and possibly cut and paste the url.

fields.subject: Merge and Backup tabs result in error
Clicking on the messages tab results in a problem
Software Status
fields.content:
As a user of this site you will or have been able to experience some or all of the tools I've implemented to achieve the goals. This post is to inform you of what is and is not implemented at the current time.

Implemented features:

    * Content interface: add and edit theories and evidence.
    * Opinion interface: add and edit opinions.
    * Opinion visualizations
    * Opinion comparisons

To be implemented:

    * User profiles, notifications, invite system, ... user stuff.
    * User restrictions (not all users will be allowed to edit/delete content).
    * Revision history (accept/reject changes made to user content).
    * Sharing.
    * Pagenation, search, ... Currently, the navigation of this site is raw,
      i.e., if a theory has 100 sub-theories, then you will have to keep
      scrolling for a while.  
    * Lots more...
    
Thanks again, Frank.
fields._content_rendered:
As a user of this site you will or have been able to experience some or all of the tools I've implemented to achieve the goals. This post is to inform you of what is and is not implemented at the current time.

Implemented features:

* Content interface: add and edit theories and evidence.
* Opinion interface: add and edit opinions.
* Opinion visualizations
* Opinion comparisons

To be implemented:

* User profiles, notifications, invite system, ... user stuff.
* User restrictions (not all users will be allowed to edit/delete content).
* Revision history (accept/reject changes made to user content).
* Sharing.
* Pagenation, search, ... Currently, the navigation of this site is raw,
  i.e., if a theory has 100 sub-theories, then you will have to keep
  scrolling for a while.  
* Lots more...

Thanks again, Frank.

fields.subject: Welcome Message
fields.content:
Hello everyone and welcome to the alpha version of Wiki-O. Being the alpha version expect to see bugs and missing functionality. Saying that I thank you for your participation and patience.

To facilitate the feedback process between developer and user, I will now define the goals of this project:

      * Provide a service for sharing and learning about your and others'
        opinions while avoiding arguments/emotion.
      * Make this tool unbiased, i.e., users should not feel the service itself
        favours one opinion over another.
      * Make the service easy and desirable to use for everyone.
      * Also make it desirable to use."
fields._content_rendered:
Hello everyone and welcome to the alpha version of Wiki-O. Being the alpha version expect to see bugs and missing functionality. Saying that I thank you for your participation and patience.

To facilitate the feedback process between developer and user, I will now define the goals of this project:

  * Provide a service for sharing and learning about your and others'
    opinions while avoiding arguments/emotion.
  * Make this tool unbiased, i.e., users should not feel the service itself
    favours one opinion over another.
  * Make the service easy and desirable to use for everyone.
  * Also make it desirable to use."

fields.subject: Clicking on the messages tab results in a problem
fields.content:
Page not found (404)
Request Method:	GET
Request URL:	http://www.wiki-o.com/accounts/7/404.html
Using the URLconf defined in wiki_o.urls, Django tried these URL patterns, in this order:

__debug__/
[name='index']
alpha [name='alpha']
about [name='about']
help [name='help']
theories/ [name='index']
theories/<slug:cat>/ [name='index-category']
theory/create/<slug:cat>/ [name='theory-create']
theory/<int:pk>/ [name='theory-detail']
theory/<int:pk>/del/ [name='theory-delete']
theory/<int:pk>/convert/ [name='theory-convert']
theory/<int:pk>/revert/<int:vid>/ [name='theory-revert']
theory/<int:pk>/edit/ [name='theory-edit']
theory/<int:pk>/edit_backup/ [name='theory-edit-backup']
theory/<int:pk>/edit_restore/ [name='theory-edit-restore']
theory/<int:pk>/edit_evidence/ [name='theory-edit-evidence']
theory/<int:pk>/edit_subtheories/ [name='theory-edit-subtheories']
theory/<int:pk01>/edit_inherit/<int:pk02>/ [name='theory-edit-inherit']
theory/<int:pk>/my_opinion/ [name='get_my_opinion']
theory/<int:pk>/opinion_<str:slug>/ [name='opinion-slug']
theory/<int:pk>/add_to_home [name='theory-add-to-home']
theory/<int:pk>/remove_from_home [name='theory-remove-from-home']
evidence/<int:pk>/edit/ [name='evidence-edit']
evidence/<int:pk>/ [name='evidence-detail']
evidence/<int:pk>/del/ [name='evidence-delete']
evidence/<int:pk>/convert/ [name='evidence-convert']
evidence/<int:pk>/revert/<int:vid>/ [name='evidence-revert']
evidence/<int:pk>/backup/ [name='evidence-backup']
evidence/<int:pk>/edit_restore/ [name='evidence-edit-restore']
opinion/<int:pk>/ [name='opinion-detail']
opinion-node/<int:pk>/ [name='opinion-node-detail']
opinion/demo/ [name='opinion-demo']
opinion/<int:pk>/del/ [name='opinion-delete']
opinion/<int:pk>/edit/ [name='opinion-edit']
opinion/<int:pk>/copy/ [name='opinion-copy']
opinion/<int:pk>/hide/ [name='opinion-hide-user']
opinion/<int:pk>/unhide/ [name='opinion-reveal-user']
opinion/<int:pk01>/vs/<int:pk02>/ [name='opinion-user_vs_user']
opinion/<int:pk01>/vs/opinion_<str:slug02>/ [name='opinion-user_vs_slug']
theory/opinion_<str:slug01>/vs/<int:pk02>/ [name='opinion-slug_vs_user']
theory/<int:theory_pk>/opinion_<str:slug01>/vs/opinion_<str:slug02>/ [name='opinion-slug_vs_slug']
admin/
feedback/
accounts/ ^ ^signup/$ [name='account_signup']
accounts/ ^ ^login/$ [name='account_login']
accounts/ ^ ^logout/$ [name='account_logout']
accounts/ ^ ^password/change/$ [name='account_change_password']
accounts/ ^ ^password/set/$ [name='account_set_password']
accounts/ ^ ^inactive/$ [name='account_inactive']
accounts/ ^ ^email/$ [name='account_email']
accounts/ ^ ^confirm-email/$ [name='account_email_verification_sent']
accounts/ ^ ^confirm-email/(?P<key>[-:\w]+)/$ [name='account_confirm_email']
accounts/ ^ ^password/reset/$ [name='account_reset_password']
accounts/ ^ ^password/reset/done/$ [name='account_reset_password_done']
accounts/ ^ ^password/reset/key/(?P<uidb36>[0-9A-Za-z]+)-(?P<key>.+)/$ [name='account_reset_password_from_key']
accounts/ ^ ^password/reset/key/done/$ [name='account_reset_password_from_key_done']
accounts/ ^social/
accounts/ login/ [name='login']
accounts/ logout/ [name='logout']
accounts/ password_change/ [name='password_change']
accounts/ password_change/done/ [name='password_change_done']
accounts/ password_reset/ [name='password_reset']
accounts/ password_reset/done/ [name='password_reset_done']
accounts/ reset/<uidb64>/<token>/ [name='password_reset_confirm']
accounts/ reset/done/ [name='password_reset_complete']
accounts/ profile/ [name='user-edit']
accounts/ <int:pk>/ [name='user-detail']
accounts/invitations/
The current path, accounts/7/404.html, didn't match any of these.

You're seeing this error because you have DEBUG = True in your Django settings file. Change that to False, and Django will display a standard 404 page.

fields.subject: Re: Clicking on the messages tab results in a problem
fields.content: Quit complaining.... Why am I posting at times in the future?
fields._content_rendered: Quit complaining.... Why am I posting at times in the future?

fields.subject: Re: Software Status
fields.content:
Bellow is a list of the implemented/un-implemented features of this web-site. As always, the work is ongoing and I applogize for any bugs.

Implemented Features:

    * Theory/Evidence Interface:
        - add/edit/delete theories and evidence
        - add/remove evidence/sub-theory edges (inherit/delete)
        - swap theory true/false statements
        - convert sub-theory to and from evidence
        - merge two nodes of the same type
        - autosave/manual backup/revert
        - cascading activity log
        - follow/un-follow
        - sort by rank

    * Categories:
        - add/remove theories
        - follow/un-follow
        - sort by rank
        - search

    * Opinion Interface:
        - add/edit/copy/delete
        - advanced editor
        - wizard editor
        - analytics:
            - point distribution (pie chart)
            - population distribution (bar graph)
            - evidence distribution (venn diagram)
        - aggregated stats:
            - all users
            - supporters
            - moderates
            - opposers
        - compare with:
            - other user opinions
            - aggregated stats
        - follow/un-follow user opinions
        - sort by rank
    
    * Feedback Forums:
        - user permissions


To be implemented:

    * Mobile Interface
    * User promotions/demotions
    * User invitations
fields._content_rendered:
Bellow is a list of the implemented/un-implemented features of this web-site. As always, the work is ongoing and I applogize for any bugs.

Implemented Features:

* Theory/Evidence Interface:
    - add/edit/delete theories and evidence
    - add/remove evidence/sub-theory edges (inherit/delete)
    - swap theory true/false statements
    - convert sub-theory to and from evidence
    - merge two nodes of the same type
    - autosave/manual backup/revert
    - cascading activity log
    - follow/un-follow
    - sort by rank

* Categories:
    - add/remove theories
    - follow/un-follow
    - sort by rank
    - search

* Opinion Interface:
    - add/edit/copy/delete
    - advanced editor
    - wizard editor
    - analytics:
        - point distribution (pie chart)
        - population distribution (bar graph)
        - evidence distribution (venn diagram)
    - aggregated stats:
        - all users
        - supporters
        - moderates
        - opposers
    - compare with:
        - other user opinions
        - aggregated stats
    - follow/un-follow user opinions
    - sort by rank

* Feedback Forums:
    - user permissions

To be implemented:

* Mobile Interface
* User promotions/demotions
* User invitations
